page.title: 11Transport-Biddestone
page.content: Most people have their own cars which seems almost a necessity. This leaves children, the elderly, the disabled, and wives in need of the bus service. This is run by private operators and subsidised by the county council. We have two school buses a day, to Corsham and to Chippenham, also available to the general public. There are buses for shopping. One goes to Corsham on Tuesday am One goes to Chippenham on Friday am One goes to Corsham On Saturday am A regular service between Bath & Chippenham runs through Corsham. Two operators run a daily service to London with a stop at Pickwick. Fast trains run from Chippenham to London,Swindon,Bristol. Many young people use mopeds or bicycles and they hitch-hike to Bath.
